sentence.Network_en: The Swedes do not have Santa Claus . What they have is Christmas Gnome.
sentence.Network_cn: 瑞典人的圣诞节里没有圣诞老人, 但他们却有一个圣诞守护神.

sentence.Network_en: Susan bought a garden gnome to decorate her garden.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏珊买了一个土地神像来装饰她的花园。

sentence.Network_en: The GNOME desktop has been like this way too.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 事实上，哥布林和侏儒（Gnome）(联盟的一个种族)同是工程学最先进的两大种族，不过哥布林的工程学比较偏向破坏性，失控爆炸 …
哥布林与地精(Gnome)很相似，但却不是相同的生物。不过，由于传说的流传上的差异，使不少人都把这两种生命混淆。
地之精灵:玛亚(maya)葛罗姆(gnome)堤洛(tero)从前教会宣称,所有的精灵都是恶魔的化身因为他们认定构成宇宙的元素是由上帝所掌管 …

PerfectNetExp.exp: 网络对象模型环境(GNU Network Object Model Environment)
PerfectNetExp.abs: ...m 的桌面 shell 程序，如 KDE 桌面和 GNU Network Object Model Environment (GNOME) 桌面。

list.abs: esound－clients (办公室装) esound声音驱动gdm gnome图形登陆管理udev U盘
...!故事系讲两班住喺后花园、世世代代都势不两立嘅「花园精灵」(garden gnomes) ——「小红帽」与「蓝帽子」。
Englishtown-世界领先的在线英语学校 ... 1。roaming gnome 周游世界的小矮人 2。cavemen 原始人类.
-... ... 经典排序算法 - 希尔排序 Shell sort 经典排序算法 - 地精排序 Gnome Sort 经典排序算法 - 奇偶排序 Odd-even sort.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French, from modern Latin gnomus, a word used by Paracelsus as a synonym of Pygmaeus, denoting a mythical race of very small people said to inhabit parts of Ethiopia and India (compare with pygmy)
late 16th cent.: from Greek gnōmē 'thought, opinion' (related to gignōskein 'know')

entry.tran: 地精，土地神（童话故事中的神灵，英国人有时在花园中摆放小的土地神雕像）
entry.def: In children's stories, a gnome is an imaginary creature that is like a tiny old man with a beard and pointed hat. In Britain people sometimes have small statues of gnomes in their gardens.

means.word_mean: 1. a legendary creature resembling a tiny old man; lives in the depths of the earth and guards buried treasure
2. a short pithy saying expressing a general truth

list.explanation: 不知名的专家(尤指不抛头露面的统计学家或幕后观察家)
